name: The Spatials: Galactology
description: The Spatials are back with Galactology! Design, build and protect your colony station from the many enemies you will make while exploring the galaxy and exploding their homeworlds.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.0 Ghz+ Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000+ / AMD Radeon HD 4000+ / NVIDIA GeForce GT 200+ Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires stable OpenGL 3.2 drivers with GLSL support
